#summary Simple rules to follow to have your script playing on the Radio pyo.

= Here is the rules to follow if you want to have your script playing on the Radio pyo =


= Details =

  * First of all, it must be a one-page script, named as _author`_`title.py_
  * The server's variable must be _s_
  * The script must be finite in time, with fadein and fadeout. Example: for a 5 minutes piece, duration is specified, in seconds, with this line : _duration = 300_ 
  * No soundfile, only synthesis!
  * To submit your script, send it by email to belangeo@gmail.com or jm.dumas@gmail.com
